metadata.name: Intro
metadata.value:
We are OMP, a game changer that optimizes supply chains of the world’s leading companies with our very own smart software and services.

Are you ready to dive deep into JavaScript and React? Are you passionate about building cutting-edge user interfaces to solve complex workflows? And do you want to work in a team where you can improve your skills?

Look no further and become a Front-End Developer at OMP! The world of supply chain planning offers plenty of interesting challenges for you to solve. Read on to learn more.

metadata.name: Profile
metadata.value:
A Bachelor or Master (or equivalent by experience) in ICT, Applied Informatic Sciences, Information Management, Multimedia, or another relevant field.
Knowledge of modern JavaScript (and add-ons like typescript), HTML5, React, or equivalent JavaScript Framework.
Pride in the high-quality software that you write.

metadata.name: Bonus Points (Profile)
metadata.value:
Relevant work experience, including internships or bootcamps.
Knowledge of NativeScript or React-Native.
Experience with Electron.
Knowledge of test frameworks, such as Jest or Jasmine.

metadata.name: Soft Skills
metadata.value:
Problem solving 
Communication 
Teamwork 
Pragmatic 
Passionate

metadata.name: Your Future
metadata.value:
At OMP, we’re eager to find your best career fit. Our talent management program supports your personal development and empowers you to build a career in line with your ambitions.

Many of our team members who start as Front-End Developers grow into roles in software architecture, software expertise, project management, or people management.

metadata.name: Your Team
metadata.value: As our new Front-End Developer, you’ll be part of a large, fast-growing, international Software Development team located in Belgium (Antwerp, Ghent, Wavre), Spain (Barcelona), Ukraine (Lviv), and the US (Atlanta). Software Development creates leading software solutions that make a difference to our customers. We make smart, robust, and scalable software to solve complex supply chain planning challenges.

metadata.name: SEO description
metadata.value: Are you ready to dive deep into JavaScript and React? Are you passionate about building cutting-edge user interfaces to solve complex workflows? Join OMP!

metadata.name: OGTitle
metadata.value: Join OMP Barcelona as a Front-End Developer

title: Senior Front-End Developer
content:
As a Senior Front-End Developer, your main focus is to review and reshape the entire user experience to match the needs of tomorrow. In close collaboration with user-centric design experts, UX designers, and our experienced team of functional product managers, you translate complex server logic and features into a powerful and intuitive UI.
We believe in an integrated approach, where every team member is involved in all steps of the software development lifecycle: analysis, architectural design, programming, and maintenance. We expect you to be the proud owner of your code and take responsibility for it.
You are responsible for:

Building cutting-edge user interfaces to solve complex workflows.
Analytical and creative thinking to translate customer requirements into technical software design and algorithms.
Writing code that conforms to high-quality standards and reviewing code written by other members of your team.
Working closely with our scrum testers to give input on useful scenarios and to help debug where necessary.
Maintaining and supporting your developments according to feedback from functional experts and UX designers.

questions.label: Do you need a work permit?
How many years of experience do you have?
